text: Hagi sondia vahe'mo'za ha'pinti'ma eri'za e'naza kukenaramine, zamaga nonena ana kva vahetmimo'za e'za emeri'za zamavufaga zamavapama zamavare'za e'naza kina vahetmina zamizage'za kukena nehazageno, nezane tinena zamizage'za nenazage'za zamavufagama tga hunerera masavena frezmante'naze. Ana hute'za kama vuga'ma osaza vahetmina, donki agumpi zamavarenente'za amne vahe'enena zamavare'za zamafuhe'zama mani'narega tofenke kumapi Jeriko kumate ome zamatrete'za, ete Sameria kumate e'naze.
